alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 2:07PM AKST until February 10 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Plan on areas of poor visibilities and slick roadways to create difficult travel conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 20 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Along summits of the Elliott Highway. * WHEN...9 PM today to 9 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting 30 to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
